channel.title: Can Someone please post a Scar download with SRL Pre-Installed?
channel.description: I have tried many times to install srl and have always failed :confused: :confused: :confused:, does anyone mind if they post a link to download a scar file in which srl is pre-installed. It shouldn't be that hard considering most scar users have already installed it, so simply allow me to download your scar file or something lol. I think it would help a lot of people ;D[br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2007, 06:01:19 PM[/size][hr]nobody is going to reply??[br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2007, 06:52:48 PM[/size][hr]someone please give me one, or tell me were I can download one...Im a noob

item.title: Can Someone please post a Scar download with SRL Pre-Installed?
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

Here you go:
http://rapidshare.com/files/42433204/ScarInstall.exe.html

File Size: 3.21 MB
File Exxt: *.exe
Requires: None - No InstallShield etc.
Systems: Any - Including Safe Mode and Linux (Just change the Install Path).

Read full topic

item.title: Can Someone please post a Scar download with SRL Pre-Installed?
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

Why don’t you just download and install SCAR and press “Download SRL” in the menu??
